content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's ok to tell someone you aren't interested in talking when you're busy at work.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's wrong to grow apart from your partner.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: It's good to be in control of your sexuality.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 4:
Text: It is bad to let addiction control your life.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: It's bad to prematurely quit because of frustration.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: It's good to help yourself get over your depression.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: It's understandable to want friends and family around when getting a medical operation.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's bad to have a drug addiction.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's wise to do monthly payments if you can't pay back a loan right away.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: You shouldn't discriminate against people because of their income level.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 11:
Text: It's bad to be only attracted to fictional characters.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: It is okay to only want to hang out with certain people.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 13:
Text: It's good for a parent to want their children to make the best decisions possible.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Making dinner is economical as opposed to eating out.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: You shouldn't lie about drug use.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: It's not okay to be in a romantic relationship with a teacher.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It is bad to drink too much.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 18:
Text: It's wrong for people that care about each other to argue.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: It's wrong to be sick of life.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: It is important for both partners to use birth control items.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: You shouldn't expect others to pick up the tab for your mistakes.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It is good to be remorseful and admit when you've done wrong
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: You shouldn't video tape someone without their permission.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 24:
Text: Parents should involve children in their problems
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 25:
Text: It is good to give your kids life advice.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: You shouldn't judge people by how they look
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 27:
Text: You should never do anything that may cause your children to despise you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: If you don't want to crash, you shouldn't drive recklessly.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 29:
Text: You shouldn't do drugs.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 30:
Text: It's good to get help when you need it.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Human-rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: It's not normal to dislike everybody
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: It's bad to have an overly pessimistic world view.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: It's not okay to have to rely on special tools when they aren't really needed.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: It's good to have people you can use to improve yourself.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 5:
Text: It's wise to never let yourself get embarrassed by your significant other.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: You can't expect someone to pay off their loans immediately.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: It is bad to have arguments.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: It's bad to use sex to get what you want.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 9:
Text: It's acceptable to shun someone who hates people in your group.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: It's understandable to want to ruin your ex's new relationships.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 11:
Text: You should thank someone when they invite tou to thier wedding.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 12:
Text: It's expected that families will not get along well with their in-laws.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 13:
Text: It's wrong to love people who are engaged.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: You shouldn't have your partner over when you have your friend over at your house.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 15:
Text: It is immoral for a supervisor to pursue their employees romantically.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 16:
Text: You should love your parents.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: It's understandable that you don't want to be burden by other people's moments in their lives.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: It is responsible to look out for the children of the community.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: You don't owe a partner an explanation of past relationships.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: It's expected that a parent be polite to their children.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 21:
Text: Adults are expected to bathe daily.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: It's inappropriate for a parent to help a teenage boy shower.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 23:
Text: It's understandable to want to get back at someone.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: You should treat employees well
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 25:
Text: It is good to have rules.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 26:
Text: It's not okay to abuse things like drugs.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 27:
Text: It's wrong to want your girlfriend to leave.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: It's okay to be upset if someone you report to at work lets you take the blame for something you didn't do.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 29:
Text: You don't have to help out your parents if you don't feel like it.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: Your boyfriend has the right to wear whatever underwear he chooses.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Target Example:
Text: You should be grateful when someone does nice things for you.
Annotation from annotator:
